name: Fun Jumping Game Cool Jump
description:
One of the most addicting, fun and cool mobile games for all family!!!

How high can you jump?
Journey up a geometry world, perpetually jumping from one platform to the next, picking up star packs, avoiding enemies, pipes and try to survive as long as you can. Collect stars, open new units, achieve better score and have a lot of fun.

How to play:
Just tilt to move left or right.

And be warned: this game is insanely fun, cool and addictive!

In order to be able restore your in-app purchase you have to sign in into Game Center!!!
